briefdescription.para: Used to render a surface or edge affected by the light.

detaileddescription.para: It uses a per fragment lighting model, and renders brighter the selected item.

briefdescription.para: Used to render a polygon edge or points.

detaileddescription.para: It renders in a uniform color and is not affected by light. It renders the selected item in black.

briefdescription.para: Used to render a polyline or a surface that is not affected by light, like a cutting plane.

detaileddescription.para: It renders in a uniform color that does not change with selection.

briefdescription.para: Used to render a textured polyhedron.

detaileddescription.para: Affected by light.

briefdescription.para: Used to render a two-faced plane.

detaileddescription.para: The two faces have a different color. Not affected by light.

briefdescription.para: Used to render the edges of a textured polyhedorn.

detaileddescription.para: Not affected by light.

briefdescription.para: Used to display instanced rendered spheres.Affected by light.
Used to display instanced rendered wired spheres.

detaileddescription.para: Not affected by light.

briefdescription.para: Used to render a c3t3_item.

detaileddescription.para: It discards any fragment on a side of a plane, meaning that nothing is displayed on this side of the plane. Affected by light.

briefdescription.para: Used to render the edges of a c3t3_item.

detaileddescription.para: It discards any fragment on a side of a plane, meaning that nothing is displayed on this side of the plane. Not affected by light.

briefdescription.para: Used to render the spheres of an item with a cut plane.
Used to render one or several spheres.
Used to render flat shading without pre computing normals.
Used to render flat shading without pre computing normals without geometry shader.
Used to render edges with width superior to 1.

detaileddescription.para: Holds the number of different programs in this enum.

briefdescription.para: The OpenGL_program_IDs enum.

detaileddescription.para:
This enum holds the OpenGL programs IDs that are given to getShaderProgram() and attribBuffers().
getShaderProgram
attribBuffers

briefdescription.para: The default color of a scene_item.

detaileddescription.para: This color is the one that will be displayed if none is specified after its creation.

briefdescription.para: Contains the number of group and subgroups containing this item.
Holds the BBox of the item.
The name of the item.
The color of the item.
The visibility of the item.
The parent group, or 0 if the item is not in a group.
Specifies if the item is currently selected.
Holds the number of vertices that are not linked to the polyhedron from the OFF file.
Decides if the draw function must call initializeBuffers() or not.

detaileddescription.para:
It is set to true in the end of initializeBuffers() and to false in invalidateOpenGLBuffers(). The need of this boolean comes from the need of a context from the OpenGLFunctions used in initializeBuffers().
initializeBuffers()
invalidateOpenGLBuffers()

briefdescription.para: The rendering mode of the item.
The default context menu.
Contains the previous RenderingMode.

detaileddescription.para:
This is used to determine if invalidateOpenGLBuffers should be called or not in certain cases.
invalidateOpenGLBuffers()

briefdescription.para: Contains the current RenderingMode.

detaileddescription.para:
This is used to determine if invalidateOpenGLBuffers should be called or not in certain cases.
invalidateOpenGLBuffers()

briefdescription.para: Contains the size of the vector of VBOs.
Contains the size of the map of VAOs.
Contains the VBOs.
Contains the VAOs.
The Constructor.

detaileddescription.para: This is where the vectors of VBOs and VAOs are initialized.

briefdescription.para: Sets the number of isolated vertices.

detaileddescription.para:
This number will be displayed in a warning box at loading.
getNbIsolatedvertices

briefdescription.para: Getter for the number of isolated vertices.
Duplicates the item.

detaileddescription.para: Creates a new item as a copy of this one.

briefdescription.para: Indicates if m is supported.

detaileddescription.para: If it is, it will be displayed in the context menu of the item.

briefdescription.para: Deprecated. Does nothing.
The drawing function for faces.

detaileddescription.para:
Draws the faces of the item in the viewer. The data for the drawing is gathered in computeElements(), and is sent to buffers in initializeBuffers().
computeElements()
initializeBuffers()

briefdescription.para: Deprecated. Does nothing.
The drawing function for the edges.

detaileddescription.para:
Draws the edges and lines of the item in the viewer. The data for the drawing is gathered in computeElements(), and is sent to buffers in initializeBuffers().
computeElements()
initializeBuffers()

briefdescription.para: Deprecated. Does nothing.
The drawing function for the points.

detaileddescription.para:
Draws the points of the item in the viewer. The data for the drawing is gathered in computeElements(), and is sent to buffers in initializeBuffers().
computeElements()
initializeBuffers()

briefdescription.para: Called by the scene. If b is true, then this item is currently selected.
Contains meta-data about the item.

simplesect.para: a QString containing meta-data about the item.

briefdescription.para: Contains graphical meta-data about the item.

simplesect.para: a QPixmap containing graphical meta-data about the item.

briefdescription.para: Contains the font used for the data of the item.

simplesect.para: a QFont containing the font used for the data of the item.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the item is finite or not.

detaileddescription.para: For example, a plane is not finite. If false, the BBox is not computed.

briefdescription.para: Specifies if the item is empty or null.

detaileddescription.para: If true, the BBox is not computed.

briefdescription.para: The item's bounding box.

detaileddescription.para:
If the Bbox has never been computed, computes it and saves the result for further calls.
the item's bounding box.

briefdescription.para: the item's bounding box's diagonal length.

detaileddescription.para:
If the diagonal's length has never been computed, computes it and saves the result for further calls.
the item's bounding box's diagonal length.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the item has a ManipulatedFrame.
The manipulatedFrame of the item.

detaileddescription.para:
A manipulated frame is an independant system that can be translated or rotated using the Ctrl key and the mouse.
the manipulatedFrame of the item.

briefdescription.para: Getter for the item's color.

simplesect.para: the current color of the item.

briefdescription.para: Getter for the item's name.

simplesect.para: the current name of the item.

briefdescription.para: If the item is not visible, it is not drawn and its Bbox is ignored in the computation of the scene's.

simplesect.para: the current visibility of the item.

briefdescription.para: Getter for the item's rendering mode.

simplesect.para: the current rendering mode of the item.

briefdescription.para: The renderingMode's name.

simplesect.para: the current rendering mode of the item as a human readable string.

briefdescription.para: Context menu.

detaileddescription.para: Contains the list of the supported rendering modes, the Operations menu, actions to save or clone the item if it is supported and any contextual action for the item.

briefdescription.para: setId informs the item of its current index in the scene entries.
getId returns the current index of this item in the scene entries.
Handles key press events.
The group containing the item.

simplesect.para: the parent group if the item is in a group
0 if the item is not in a group.

briefdescription.para: Returns a Header_data struct containing the header information.
Returns true if the item has statistics.
Returns a QString containing the requested value for the the table in the statistics dialog.

para.verbatim: * Example : * ____________________________ * | |Name |Cube | * | |_______|_____| * |General Info | #Edges|12 | * |_____________|_______|_____| * compute stats(0) should return "Cube" and computeStats(1) should return QString::number(12); * The numbers must be coherent with the order of declaration of the titles in the header. *

briefdescription.para: Notifies the program that the internal data or the properties of an item has changed, and that it must be computed again.

detaileddescription.para: It is important to call this function whenever the internal data is changed, or the displayed item will not be updated.

briefdescription.para: Setter for the color of the item.
Setter for the RGB color of the item.

detaileddescription.para:
Calls setColor(QColor).
setColor(QColor c)

briefdescription.para: Sets the name of the item.
Sets the visibility of the item.
Set the parent group.

detaileddescription.para: If group==0, then the item has no parent. This function is called by Scene::changeGroup and should not be called manually.

briefdescription.para: Sets the rendering mode of the item.
Sets the RenderingMode to Points.
Sets the RenderingMode to Points.
Sets the RenderingMode to Wireframe.
Sets the RenderingMode to Flat.
Set the RenderingMode to FlatPlusEdges.
Sets the RenderingMode to Gouraud.
Sets the RenderingMode to PointsPlusNormals.
Emits an aboutToBeDestroyed() signal.

detaileddescription.para: Override this function to delete what needs to be deleted on destruction. This might be needed as items are not always deleted right away by Qt and this behaviour may cause a simily memory leak, for example when multiple items are created at the same time.

briefdescription.para: Returns the alpha value for the item.

detaileddescription.para: Must be called within a valid openGl context.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the aplha Slider for this item.

memberdef.argsstring: (double orig_x, double orig_y, double orig_z, double dir_x, double dir_y, double dir_z)
memberdef.name: select

briefdescription.para: Selects a point through raycasting.
Is emitted to notify a change in the item's data.
Is emitted when the item is shown to notify a change in the item's visibility.

detaileddescription.para: Typically used to update the scene's bbox;

briefdescription.para: Is emitted to notify that the item is about to be deleted.
Is emitted to require a new display.
Adds a VAO to the Map.
Fills the VBOs with data.
Passes all the uniform data to the shaders.

detaileddescription.para: According to program_name, this data may change.

briefdescription.para: Compatibility function.

detaileddescription.para: Calls viewer->getShaderProgram().

briefdescription.para: This class represents an object in the OpenGL scene.

detaileddescription.para: It contains all the functions called by the Scene. It acts like a mix between an interface and a helper.
